alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon; Shelby (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued May 02 at 4:11PM CDT until May 02 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Christian County in central Illinois... South central Sangamon County in central Illinois... Southern Shelby County in central Illinois... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 410 PM CDT, a dust channel was near Jeisyville, or 9 miles west of Taylorville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 78 and 83. Locations impacted include... Taylorville, Shelbyville, Pana, Pawnee, Kincaid, Divernon, Assumption, Morrisonville, Stewardson, Cowden, Tower Hill, Bulpitt, Jeisyville, Tovey, Strasburg, Herrick, Rosamond, Clarksburg, Owaneco and Palmer. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
